function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High residential building density and building-level crowding","Impact":"Increased transmission and propagation of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures, improving ventilation systems, and promoting outdoor spaces","Technologies":"Smart building technologies, air purifiers, and urban planning tools","People":"Residents, commuters, and visitors in densely populated areas","Owner":"City planners, building owners, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate COVID-19 testing capacity in the early days of the pandemic","Impact":"Undercounting of COVID-19 cases leading to potential spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Scaling up testing capacity, implementing contact tracing, and promoting public awareness","Technologies":"PCR testing, rapid antigen testing, and digital contact tracing apps","People":"Undetected cases, healthcare workers, and the general population","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government agencies, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Less predictable human activities due to behavioral changes related to modification of non-pharmaceutical interventions","Impact":"Difficulty in predicting and managing the spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Continuous public health communication, adaptive response strategies, and data-driven modeling","Technologies":"Data analytics, predictive modeling, and communication platforms","People":"Community members, public health officials, and behavioral scientists","Owner":"Public health authorities, research institutions, and community organizations"}]}
